channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why The Supreme Court’s Attack On Federal Agencies Is A Boon For Crypto
item.description: A trifecta of recent decisions could hobble the SEC and help crypto banks win key rights.

item.title: The Internet Isn’t Big Enough To Train AI. One Fix? Fake Data.
item.description: A new wave of startups are anticipating the existential crisis facing the AI industry: What happens when we run out of data?

item.title: What AI Can And Cannot Do For Recruiting Today
item.description: Understanding what AI can and cannot do in recruiting today is crucial for leveraging its strengths while being aware of its shortcomings.

item.title: Why AI Projects Take Time To Deliver Value
item.description: AI projects are taking twice as long to pivot from the planning stage to full-scale launches.
